title: President Trump signs order to dismantle Education Department
shortDescription: President Trump ordered the dismantling the Department of Education, but the White House acknowledged the agency won't go away entirely.

title: This Buddhist country with no traffic lights may be on the Trump travel ban list
shortDescription: Bhutan is a tiny, remote Himalayan kingdom nestled between China and India. It has no traffic lights. Here's why it may be added to a White House travel ban.

title: Judge who opposed Trump attacks on judges cleared of ethics complaints
shortDescription: A federal judge has been cleared of wrongdoing for going on CNN to speak out against threats made against members of the judiciary.

title: Trump officials propose plan revamping US foreign aid, memo says
shortDescription: A Trump admin memo argues the U.S. foreign aid structure is too broad, too costly and failed to reduce some nations' dependency on U.S. assistance.

title: What to know about Trump's order to dismantle Education Department
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is set to sign an executive order Thursday afternoon that aims to eliminate the U.S. Department of Education.

title: Ex-Trump lawyer says he'll sue over private info released in JFK files
shortDescription: Joseph diGenova, a former top Justice Department official - and staunch Trump ally and lawyer - called the breach "sloppy and unprofessional."

title: 'Buy Tesla,' Trump Commerce Sec. encourages as stock sinks
shortDescription: Howard Lutnick, a member of Trump's cabinet, told Americans to invest in his fellow billionaire's vehicle company, despite its falling value.

title: Efforts to challenge Trump's actions intensify
shortDescription: Nationwide, there were more than 2,000 protests in February, more than twice as many as the same month of the first Trump administration.

title: It's Barron Trump's birthday: The 'King of the internet' turns 19

title: Justice Roberts' rebuke marks growing Trump showdown with courts
shortDescription: Chief Justice John Roberts' rebuke of President Donald Trump's call to impeach a judge marks a growing showdown between Trump and the courts.

title: Trump admin cuts project tracking stolen Ukrainian kids
shortDescription: The Yale University research lab was tracking thousands of Ukrainian children forcibly deported to Russia since the invasion began.

title: 'New leadership as we move forward': Democrats rail against Schumer
shortDescription: Chuck Schumer continues to face backlash from some members of his party after he voted in favor of a spending bill that averted a government shutdown.
